text: is a Japanese politician. He has been the Secretary-General of the Liberal Democratic Party since 2024. He was the Minister of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries from 2015 to 2016. He was a member of the House of Councillors from 1998 to 2004 and has been a member of the House of Representatives since 2004. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kagoshima Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Ministers of agriculture, forestry and fisheries of Japan
title: Hiroshi Moriyama
